For those of you who are having an issue installing the game.  Use the steambackup2.exe to install!  Do not install using Setup.exe!

Specs:

Windows 7 64bit
Core i7
Ati 5870

Hi guys, i am having a problem. After finishing installing from steambackup2.exe and copying steam_api from crack to desination folder (where games was installed). I am havng this error msg : 
"The program can't start because "d3dx9_43.dll" is missing from your computer"
Can someone pls help me ?

@polidan19
you have install direct x, im not sure which one, but its either dx9 dx10 or dx11 :)
dircetx 9.0c will fix the d3dx9_43.dll problem. Had the problem, updated and now its fixed.

Works perfectly, thanks.
